comment.text: This translation key is used for a button that copies a public link when clicked. In the context of a file upload process, this link can be shared publicly to provide quick access to the uploaded content. It appears as a primary button in a dialog box, allowing users to easily share their files.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ກ໊ອບລິ້ງສາທາລະນະ" is a literal transliteration and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Copy public link' in a natural Lao way. While it's understandable, it sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສາທາລະນະລິ້ງຄັດລອກ (Sathalan link kat lok) - This translates to 'Public link copy' and sounds more natural in Lao.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Copiere link public' is not the most natural Romanian phrasing. 'Copiere link public' translates literally as 'Copy public link.' A more idiomatic translation would be 'Copiere link-ul public'.  The use of the definite article 'ul' sounds more natural.
The word 'සබැඳියක්' (sabandiyak) is slightly awkward. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පොදු සබැඳුම පිටපත් කරන්න (pudu sabanduma pitapata karanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the meaning, a more literal translation of 'public link' is ' පොදු සබැඳිය' (pudu sabandiya).  The suffix '-ak' on 'සබැඳියක්' implies a single instance, which isn't necessarily what is intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පොදු සබැඳුම පිටපත් කරන්න (pudu sabanduma pitapata karanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Копирај јавни линк' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to say 'Copy public link' in Serbian (Cyrillic). While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'Копирај линк за јавност' or 'Копирај линк за дељење'.
